# Matplotlib fix1

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/matplotlib-fix1
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/matplotlib-fix1
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install matplotlib-fix1
matplotlib-fix1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g matplotlib-fix1
matplotlib-fix1 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
